verbs.description: as [ARG0: rich nations] [V: close] [ARG1: the door on refugees uganda] welcomes them in uganda refugees are given land the right to work and freedom to move around and far from prompting a backlash ugandans remain welcoming of refugees joseph kony africa administrator united states south sudan uganda aids yoweri museveni kenya democratic republic of congo president yoweri museveni charles azamuke solomon osakan sudan agnes ajonye ebola ofua idi amin simon ludoru europe adili chandia american government batagwenda martin okuonzi united nations band united nations amos chandiga mark idraku sam omongo tanzania
